window

Class UIWindowHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • window.CanvasWindow
      • window.UIWindowHandler

  • public class UIWindowHandler
extends CanvasWindow
    Responsibility:
    Managing the correct windows.

      • getTableDesignWidth

        public java.lang.Integer getTableDesignWidth(java.lang.String string)
        Gets the width of the column names in the table design window of a given table name.
        Parameters:
        string - The name of the table active in the window
        Returns:
        The width of the column names in the table design window of the given table name if it has been initialized.
        Returns:
        The default width otherwise.
